body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Peter Richardson and the customer's name is Virginia Sanders.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Peter Richardson, and I represent Accounting Eagles, your trusted Accounting Firm.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Virginia! How can I assist you today with your billing queries?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit frustrated with the recent bill I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that could be unsettling. Could you please provide me with your account number, so I can look into this for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. I also need to confirm your date of birth for verification, if you don't mind.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not a problem. It's January tenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Virginia. Let me pull up your account and check the details of your billing issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help with this, Peter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! I’ll resolve this as quickly as possible. Thank you for your time, Virginia, and feel free to reach out if you have any more questions.
